purpose: To educate beginners on the fundamentals of generative AI and guide them through building projects with various AI models
principle: Utilizes Jupyter Notebooks to provide hands-on lessons that cover different aspects of generative AI, including model usage and prompt engineering
reusability: Open-source educational resource that can be adapted for self-learning or integrated into educational programs
limitations: Requires a basic understanding of Python and access to computational resources for running AI models
name: generative-ai-for-beginners

highlight: Comprehensive beginner-friendly curriculum for learning and building with Generative AI using practical examples
